data.text:
l had the best morning with gorgeous views topped by an amazing Bar staff called Ravi! He is so attentive and kind! Nothing was too much to ask and he helped set up our floating breakfast! 

If you ever at Shangra-Dubai, spend a morning at Ikandy pool bar and asl for Ravi!!!
data.title: Gorgeous views and amazing staff namely RAVI!!

data.text:
I had a great stay here. The room was larger than average and had a view of the Burj Khalifa. The food on site was good and the service was always helpful and polite from all staff, from the bellhop to the front desk and everyone else.

The bed was comfy (maybe a little on the soft side) and internet was sufficiently fast (and free).

The view from the outdoor deck (that can be closed for private events, I think) on the 42 floor is really the best part, though. Great views all around, but especially of the Burj Khalifa.

Despite being close to that and the mall, it was surprisingly hard to walk to given the big roads and interchange in the way. I did it once and it took ~40 minutes. The train will get you there, but it also will take you 30 probably. A cab took maybe 15 because of the zig zag needed.
data.title: Great experience and great views

data.text: The Shangri-la is in a great location to explore the city within 5 minutes walking distance of the very clean and user friendly metro. The rooms are comfortable and quiet for an excellent night‘s sleep. Absolutely remarkable is the breakfast buffet with anything you could only wish for! The staff was very friendly and we had nice chats with the f+b manager and the general manager. I hope to return soon and would definitely recommend to family and friends coming to the area. Thank you all for a memorable stay!
data.title: one of the best buffet breakfasts ever!

user_location.name: Bern, Bern Mittelland District, Canton of Bern

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Swiss-Sandra1968, 

Thank you very much for taking the time to share your review on Tripadvisor about your stay at Shangri-La Dubai.

We are very much delighted to read that you had an amazing time with us and were very satisfied with the services and attention provided by our warm and hospitable colleagues. Our goal for our guests is to experience Shangri-La’s unique spirit of hospitality and a feeling of always being taken care of. It was our pleasure to take care of you. 

We thank you for your patronage and look forward to your next visit at Shangri-La Dubai.

Yours Sincerely, 

Hakan Ozel
Area General Manager, Operations of Shangri-La Dubai
owner_response.author: Hakan Ozel

data.text: My husband and I have just spent 2 nights at the Shangri-La.  We had a Horizon club room. The room was spacious and extremely well equipped. We had an amazing view too. The hotel has wonderful facilities, including two pools. The service was exceptional. It is in a great location for downtown Dubai. The benefits received with the Horizon Club were well worth the extra money. The  breakfast and afternoon tea were delicious and the happy hour was great too. We were very impressed with everything the Shangri-La provided during our stay .
data.title: Faultless.

owner_response.title: Owner response

Dear sarahnT3093DN, 

Many thanks for taking your valuable time to post your review on Tripadvisor following your stay at Shangri-La Dubai. 

We are happy to learn you enjoyed your time here and were satisfied with our facilities and services. It was our privilege to take care of you. Thank you for your patronage and we are looking forward to welcoming you back again at Shangri-La Dubai in the near future. 
 
Yours Sincerely, 

Hakan Ozel 
Area General Manager, Operations of Shangri-La Dubai
owner_response.author: Hakan Ozel

data.text: From their passionate staff,modern rooms and their beautiful pools on both the 4 th and 41 st floors.This hotel will do each and everything to make their guest feel special.During our stay,the duty manager Mr.AKRAM always went the extra mile to help us out with our itenaries or to keep our room ready before time.Shangri-La Dubai is like our second home.In this regard,I reccommend this hotel to all kinds of travellers and believe that whoever visits Shangri La Dubai will have a phenomenal experience.
data.title: Best Hotel in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Pranittpopley, 

Thank you very much for taking the time to share your review on Tripadvisor about your stay at Shangri-La Dubai.

We are very much delighted to read that you had an amazing time with us and were very satisfied with the services and attention provided by our warm and hospitable colleagues. Our goal for our guests is to experience Shangri-La’s unique spirit of hospitality and a feeling of always being taken care of. It was our pleasure to take care of you. I surely will be sharing your kind compliments with Akram, and I am pretty sure that he will definitely be overjoyed as it is always rewarding to receive positive feedback from our valued guests such as yourself. 

We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Shangri-La Dubai on your next visit.

Yours Sincerely, 

Hakan Ozel
Area General Manager, Operations of Shangri-La Dubai
